name: Martin Ranger HD DVD880 Professional Recordable Karaoke Media Player

reviews.name: Martin Ranger HD DVD880 Professional Recordable Karaoke Media Player
reviews.reviewText: I wanted this for my own home use and for Church gatherings and parties. It's great, sound is excellent, picture on the TV is outstanding and I picked up a used Bose surround sound system and it sounds amazing. I love the key adjustment feature. It would never fail, the song I wanted to sing would be too high, NO MORE, this is great!!
reviews.title: Great Karaoke Machine for home and parties.

reviews.name: Martin Ranger HD DVD880 Professional Recordable Karaoke Media Player
reviews.reviewText:
I have owned 2 other Karaoke machines, the first one died due to power hits, glad it did because the unit had a motor boating sound that came out of the unit. I had to turn the volume pretty high to not notice it anymore. The next one was DOA, so I returned it and gave up.
I got this unit for my birthday, and the first thing I notice was how quiet the power supply and laser turn table was. Love this machine, my only suggestion for the unit is not have the default output as a 1080P, I had to first hook up the video output to the TV to access the menu setup to program it. Buy it have fun.
reviews.title: 14 October 2013

reviews.name: Martin Ranger HD DVD880 Professional Recordable Karaoke Media Player
reviews.reviewText: Performs as advertised. Mics work great and the features are great. My only complaint is how long it takes to rip a cdg to mpg on usb drive.
reviews.title: 21 September 2013

reviews.name: Martin Ranger HD DVD880 Professional Recordable Karaoke Media Player
reviews.reviewText:
GREAT PRODUCT. IT WAS FAST CHANGING BETWEEN SONGS USING THE PROGRAMING BUTTON.
EASY TO SET UP AND USE. SO FAR I AM VERY PLEASED WITH IT.
reviews.title: Used it last Saturday for a dance and it was great

reviews.name: Martin Ranger HD DVD880 Professional Recordable Karaoke Media Player
reviews.reviewText: This item does just as described. Easy to set and use right out of the box.
reviews.title: Great, works just as described
